## Web3sdksProviderProps interface

The possible props for the Web3sdksProvider.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Web3sdksProviderProps<TSupportedChain extends SupportedChain = SupportedChain>
```

## Properties

| Property                                                               | Modifiers | Type                                                                                       | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [authConfig?](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.authconfig.md)             |           | [Web3sdksAuthConfig](./react.web3sdksauthconfig.md)                                        | **<i>(BETA)</i>** <i>(Optional)</i> The configuration used for web3sdks auth usage. Enables users to login to backends with their wallet.                                                                                                                                           |
| [autoConnect?](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.autoconnect.md)           |           | boolean                                                                                    | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not to attempt auto-connect to a wallet.                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [chainRpc?](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.chainrpc.md)                 |           | Partial&lt;ChainRpc&lt;TSupportedChain&gt;&gt;                                             | <i>(Optional)</i> A partial map of chainIds to rpc urls to use for certain chains If not provided, will default to the rpcUrls of the chain objects for the supported chains                                                                                                        |
| [dAppMeta?](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.dappmeta.md)                 |           | [DAppMetaData](./react.dappmetadata.md)                                                    | <i>(Optional)</i> Metadata to pass to wallet connect and walletlink wallet connect. (Used to show \*which\* dApp is being connected to in mobile wallets that support it) Defaults to just the name being passed as <code>web3sdks powered dApp</code>.                             |
| [desiredChainId](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.desiredchainid.md)      |           | TSupportedChain extends Chain ? TSupportedChain\["id"\] : TSupportedChain &#124; undefined | The chainId that your dApp is running on. While this \*can\* be <code>undefined</code> it is required to be passed. Passing <code>undefined</code> will cause no SDK to be instantiated. When passing a chainId, it \*\*must\*\* be part of the <code>supportedChains</code> array. |
| [queryClient?](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.queryclient.md)           |           | QueryClient                                                                                | **<i>(BETA)</i>** <i>(Optional)</i> The react-query client to use. (Defaults to a default client.)                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [sdkOptions?](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.sdkoptions.md)             |           | SDKOptions                                                                                 | <i>(Optional)</i> The to pass to the web3sdks SDK comes with sensible defaults                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [storageInterface?](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.storageinterface.md) |           | Web3sdksStorage                                                                            | <i>(Optional)</i> The storage interface to use with the sdk.                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [supportedChains?](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.supportedchains.md)   |           | TSupportedChain\[\]                                                                        | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of chainIds or objects that the dApp supports If not provided, all chains supported by the SDK will be supported by default                                                                                                                              |
| [walletConnectors?](./react.web3sdksproviderprops.walletconnectors.md) |           | WalletConnector\[\]                                                                        | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of connector types (strings) or wallet connector objects that the dApp supports If not provided, will default to metamask (injected), wallet connect and walletlink (coinbase wallet) with sensible defaults                                             |
